settings.title: Is your product Kosher?
settings.answer: Yes, LALO is Kosher certified.

settings.title: Is your product Halal?
settings.answer: Not at the moment, but we are currently working on Halal certification.

settings.title: Is your product gluten-free?
settings.answer: Yes.

settings.title: What allergens are in your product?
settings.answer: There are no allergens in LALO Tequila.

settings.title: What percentage of alcohol in your product?
settings.answer: 40% ABV / 80 PROOF

settings.title: Dietary Information & Nutrition
Where are you available for purchase?
settings.answer:
We are available in all 50 states.

Please visit our Find Us page to discover the closest bottle or cocktail to you.

settings.title: Question
settings.answer: Answer

settings.title: Do I need to be home to receive my package?
settings.answer: Yes. Someone over the age of 21 will need to be present at the time of delivery.

settings.title: Can you ship to PO Boxes or APO/FPO Boxes?
settings.answer: We cannot ship to PO Boxes or APO/FPO Boxes.

settings.title: What states can you ship to?
settings.answer:
We can ship everywhere in:

AK, AL, AR, AZ, CA, CO, CT, DC, DE, FL, GA, IA,ID, IL, IN, KS, KY, LA, MA, MI, MN, MO, MS, MT, NC, ND, NH, NJ, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, OR, PA, RI, TX, VA, VT, WA, WI, WV, WY.

Please utilize our zip code validator to check delivery ability before buying.

settings.title: How long does it take for the order to ship?
settings.answer:
When your package has been created with a shipping label and has been sent out into the mail stream, you will receive an email notification with tracking information.

Orders are shipped from several fulfillment centers and generally take 1-5 business days for delivery.

If it has been more than 3 business days and you have not received a tracking email, please contact purchases@lalospirits.com for assistance.

We recommend that customers place orders early in the week to decrease the likelihood that an order sits in a shipping warehouse over the weekend.

settings.title: What is your return/refund policy?
settings.answer: If you receive any damaged items, please email purchases@lalospirits.com and a member of our team will reach out directly.

settings.title: How old do you have to be to place an order?
settings.answer: 21 years old.

settings.title: Can I return my purchase?
settings.answer: If you receive any damaged items, please email purchases@lalospirits.com and a member of our team will reach out directly.

settings.title: Can I expedite my order?
settings.answer: We cannot expedite orders.

settings.title: Can you hold my shipment until a later date?
settings.answer: As long as the order has not left our warehouse, we can place a hold on the order. Please email purchases@lalospirits.com if you would like your order held for a later date.

settings.title: I ordered multiple products, but I only received some of them. What happened?
settings.answer: Your products may be shipped in separate boxes. If you did not receive all or part of your order, please contact us at purchases@lalospirits.com.

settings.title: Where should I ship my order?
settings.answer: Please enter a valid address within the continental US at check-out.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: We do not ship internationally at the moment.

settings.title: Can I add a product to my order?
settings.answer: You cannot add a product to an order once it has been placed.

settings.title: Can I remove a product from my order?
settings.answer: If you would like to alter your order, please email purchases@lalospirits.com and a member of our team will reach out directly.

settings.title: Product Information
